text: “Nena: “Kodi alipo mwa aphatikizi anu (mafano) woongolera kuchoonadi?” Nena: “Allah ndi Yemwe akuongolera ku choonadi. Kodi amene akutsogolera ku choonadi sindiye woyenera kwambiri kutsatidwa kapena (woyenera kutsatidwa ndi) yemwe sakutha kudziongola pokhapokha atawongoledwa ndi wina wake? Nanga mwatani kodi, kodi mukuweruza bwanji?”
